EmailTemplate.subject: Win the safari of a lifetime to Africa with Safari365
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Lead.FirstName},
Your friend {!Lead.Referral_Competition_Lead_Name__c} has recently entered the “Win the safari of a lifetime to Africa” competition with Safari365, and thought of you!!
Safari365 is an leading African travel company, and is giving away a 10 day safari to Africa - valued at over USD10,000 - to celebrate their 10 years in the safari trade.
If you would like to enter this incredible competition, please Enter Here
If you would not like to receive any further correspondence from Safari365, please Unsubscribe Here
The competition draw will occur on 21 November 2016.
We hope to share Africa with you, Safari365
Prize Inclusive of the following:
4 nights at the luxurious Cape Cadagon boutique hotel in Cape Town A 15 minute helicopter flip over Cape Town 3 nights on safari seeing the Big 5 at Simbavati River Lodge in the Kruger National Park 2 nights at Victoria's Falls at the 5 star Elephant Camp Lodge (including a sunset river cruise and tour of the falls) All internal flights and 4 days of car hire in Cape Town Travel to be completed before 21 November 2017
